entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QuickGrid does not support 'record'-based objects #50534
  • Issue with enableShadowCopy and shared shadowCopyDirectory in Multi-Environment Deployment #50531
  • Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead. #50529
  • Improve debugging of RequestTimeoutPolicy metadata #50526
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.2.23451.1] SPOTClient reported Telerik.UI.for.Blazor package error on the login page. #50525
  • Add HttpContext.Endpoint property #50522
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper #50519
  • Blazor SSR - can't wrap layout Body with interactive component #50518
  • Add the ability to view the authentication server session identifier returned from ITicketStore. #50517

Closed

  • Method 'DisposeAsync' in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnection' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation. #50520
  • It should be possible to request an optional injected dependency #24378
    Backlog
  • Selenium updates are broken #49869
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50493
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50492
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50495
  • Redis OutputCache no longer works on rc1 #50452
  • StreamRendering displays additional tags when large data is processed #50198
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] WebAssemblyComponentsEndpointOptions.cs should be defined in `AddWebAssemblyRenderMode` not in the DI container #49753
    8.0-rc1
  • The type TypedResults does not exist in the namespace Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http #50527
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50382

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IIS OutOfProc sometimes creating multiple app instances after recycle #50535
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50530
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Update RemoteAuthenticationOptions.cs #50524
    area-security, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update selenium versions #50511
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `460ae98` to `8a6feab` #50476
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Document the coupling between KestrelServerLimits and *TransportOptions #50468
    area-networking
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • Remove explicit UseRouting from templates #50372
    area-mvc
  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2260328 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor
  • Tidy up aka.ms links in data protection error messages #50465
    area-dataprotection
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update IdWeb 2.13.2 #50072
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
